title: Putin A Russian Spy Story 2020 Channel 4

sources.title: Putin A Russian Spy Story 2020 Channel 4
sources.description: We created the title sequence for this Channel 4 series using a combination of 2D techniques. The aim was to visualise the layers of secrecy and some of the theories which exist about President Putin's past. #russia #documentary #lifeof #motiongraphics #mograph #animation #compostcreative #putin #titlesequence #titledesign
